body.p:
Sacramento, Cal:
April 20 -- 1861.
Hon B. McGoffin.
Govr of Kentucky.
Sir:
I would respectfully request from you an appointment as Commissioner of Deeds &c, to reside in the County of Sacramento, State of California.
I am an attorney at Law for many years resident of this State, and can refer to the various members of the bar in California.

California
Comr. of Deeds
Francis Poe
Sacramento

Sec will issue Commission
B. M
